item.title: Book Review: Digital Minimalism by Cal Newport
item.author: t3hami [at] gmail [dot] com (Muhammad Tehami)
item.description:
Why I Picked It Up

I picked up Digital Minimalism because I often felt drained after hours of scrolling, yet I did not want to cut myself off from the benefits of technology. I wanted a system that would help me stay connected without losing focus and peace of mind. Newportâ€™s book turned out to be exactly that kind of guide.

The book is divided into two parts: Foundations (where the importance of digital minimalism in living a healthy life is explained) and Practices (where actionable strategies are shared).
